sent.orig: The first part(Context) is philosophy and history, to help provide foundation and motivation for what follows.

sent.orig: This book is divided into four parts: Context, Design, Tools, and Community.
sent.trans: 这本书分四章：Context（来龙去脉）、设计、工具和社团。

sent.trans: 现有的上下文感知的中间件主要集中在上下文的获取，上下文建模，以及上下文的推理等方面。

sent.orig: Context can roughly be divided into two kinds: linguistic context and extralinguistic context.
sent.trans: 语境由“言辞语境”和“言辞外语境”组成。
